about_the_game:
If you ever thought Felt Tip Circus could use a little more dazzlement and derring-do... Why not add it yourself?

This DLC package provides you with everything you need to start creating new madcap VR adventures and make them a living part of the circus experience. And, once you're done, you can share the fun with everyone on Steam Workshop!

Contains templates and unique Unity assets so you can hit the ground running. See the Workshop Guide for more information.
